item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Writing a “Hello World” program is a time-honored tradition in computer programming. Its usually the first program that people are taught to write when learning a new programming language. The page that we see right now taught me the following things: Setting up a blog using hugo. Github actions. Building and deploying a hugo site using github actions.
